comment: 2 Months in the Primary racked to secondary on three pounds of frozen berries (raspberry, blackberry, blueberry). Two weeks later in the secondary added 13oz of PB2 (powered peanut powder). 5 days later racked to a keg and carbonated at 30 psi for 3-4 minutes. Beer gunned 18 bombers and saved the rest in the keg for blending with imperial milk stout.
